子场景: 预测对比报告意图识别
业务描述: 仅时间窗，生成7月预测对比报告
输入: 帮我生成7月的预测对比报告
期望输出: 解析结果JSON: {"intent": "预测对比报告", "time_window": "2025-07", "granularity": "week", "aggregation_dimension": "物理仓", "metric": "WMAPE"}
校验点:
[MUST] 意图=预测对比报告
[MUST] 时间窗=2025-07
[MUST] 粒度=周（week，默认）
[MUST] 汇总维度=物理仓
[SHOULD] 指标=WMAPE（默认）
[MUST] 存在字段={confidence, confidence_level, confidence_reason}
[MUST] confidence_level∈{low, medium, high}
[SHOULD] confidence∈[0,1]（保留两位小数）
[SHOULD] confidence_reason为中文12~50字（结论性描述）
[MUST] clarify_needed='false'
[SHOULD] confidence_level=high

校验点:
[MUST] 意图=预测对比报告
[MUST] 时间窗=2025-07
[MUST] SKU=A001
[SHOULD] 粒度=周（week，默认）
[SHOULD] 汇总维度=物理仓
[MUST] 存在字段={confidence, confidence_level, confidence_reason}
[MUST] confidence_level∈{low, medium, high}
[SHOULD] confidence∈[0,1]（保留两位小数）
[SHOULD] confidence_reason为中文12~50字（结论性描述）
[MUST] clarify_needed='false'
[SHOULD] confidence_level=high
